name: CareGapRemark
title: Care Gap Remark Code System
description: This is a code system for Care Gap Remark

concept.definition: An order has been placed to address and close the gap
Data already present in the EHR satisfies the open gap.
EHR reports patient condition is not within allowed threshold.
Patient refused intervention to close the gap.
Action to address the gap was rejected by the provider.
Presentation of the gap to the provider was suppressed.
Gap was shown to the provider but no action was taken to assess the gap.
System cannot process the gap that was received.
